1958607.effect: If your Special Summoned monster(s) would be destroyed by your opponent's card and sent to the GY, except "Wingbacklogger", shuffle it into the Deck instead. You can return this Attack Position card to the hand, then target 1 monster in your GY; during the End Phase, add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Wingbacklogger" once per turn.
1958607.name: Wingbacklogger

1958585.effect: Other monsters you control gain 100 ATK/DEF. Attack Position monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster you control, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it.
1958585.name: Airborne Rocketblader

1958613.effect: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish 2 monsters you control (until the end of the next turn), then target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand. If a card(s) is added to your opponent's hand, except from the Deck: You can look at 1 of them, and if you do, either Set it to your opponent's field or place it on top of the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Avkalinaru" once per turn.
1958613.name: Avkalinaru

1958631.effect:
"After I brought back your wife from the dead, I figured you would be happier to see her recognize you."

The miracle worker laughed as he watched his most recent master get eaten alive.
1958631.name: Skalagdi the Miracle Worker

1958678.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Futility in Life". Must first be Ritual Summoned in Attack Position.
1958678.name: Principality

1958667.effect:
Activate 1 of the following effects.
●Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. If Summoning a non-DIVINE Fusion Monster this way, its effects are negated, also banish it when it leaves the field.
●Ritual Summon 1 Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of the Ritual Monster. If Summoning a non-DIVINE Ritual Monster this way, its effects are negated, also banish it when it leaves the field.
1958667.name: Futility in Life

1958623.effect:
2 Level 4 monsters
While this card has material, it cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. If all materials attached to this card are monsters with the same Attribute (min. 1): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster you control and 1 face-up card your opponent controls; return both targets to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Qilin, Majestic Specter" once per turn.
1958623.name: Qilin, Majestic Specter

1958597.effect:
2 monsters with different Types
If this card is Link Summoned: You can banish 1 Level 5 or lower monster from your hand, then target 1 Spell in your GY; place it on top of the Deck. You can target 1 monster this card points to; its original ATK becomes 1900, and if it does, during the end of this Phase, you can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Jillian, False Royalty" once per turn.
1958597.name: Jillian, False Royalty

1995485.effect:
1 Fairy Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Fairy monster(s)
While you control "The Sanctuary in the Sky", for this card's Synchro Summon, you can treat 1 Level 4 LIGHT monster you control as a Tuner. Cannot be destroyed by battle. You can activate the effect of "Valhalla, Hall of the Fallen" even while you control a monster(s). Once per turn: You can target 1 "Parshath" or "The Agent" monster in your GY; until the end of the next turn, replace this effect with that target's effects, also shuffle the target into the Deck.
1995485.name: Archangel from the Sanctuary in the Sky
1995485.treated_as: Archangel from the Sanctuary in the Sky

1995499.effect:
1+ Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. You take no battle or effect damage. During the End Phase: You can add 1 of these cards from your Deck to your hand, but for the rest of the Duel you cannot add a card from the same category by this effect of "Astrology Vessel from the Stars".
● 1 Normal Monster ● 1 Ritual Monster ● 1 Pendulum Monster ● 1 Equip Spell ● 1 Ritual Spell ● 1 Field Spell ● 1 Counter Trap
1995499.name: Astrology Vessel from the Stars

1995487.effect:
1 "Synchron" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
(Quick Effect): You can place 1 Barrier Counter on 1 face-up card on the field. (If a face-up card with a Barrier Counter would be destroyed by battle or card effect, remove 1 Barrier Counter from it instead.) You can only use this effect of "Barrier Warrior in the Wasteland" once per turn.
1995487.name: Barrier Warrior in the Wasteland

1994794.effect:
1 Fairy Tuner + 2+ non-Tuner Fairy monsters
This card and "The Sanctuary in the Sky" cannot be destroyed by card effects. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card; add 1 "The Sanctuary in the Sky", or 1 card that specifically lists "The Sanctuary in the Sky" in its text, from your Deck to your hand. If a Fairy monster you control battles an opponent's monster, before damage calculation: You can return the battling monsters to the hand.
1994794.name: Deity of the Sanctuary in the Sky
1994794.treated_as: Deity of the Sanctuary in the Sky

1994361.effect:
1 "Speedroid" Tuner + 1 WIND non-Tuner monster 
If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Synchro Summon of a WIND monster: You can apply 1 of these effects. ● Destroy 1 Set card on the field. ● Draw 1 card. ● Special Summon 1 of your "Speedroid" Tuners that is banished or from your GY, but it cannot be used as Link Material. You can only use this effect of "Hi-Speedroid Race Raptor" once per turn. Once per Chain, during the Battle Phase or your opponent's Main Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 WIND Synchro monster using WIND monsters you control as material, including this card you control.
1994361.name: Hi-Speedroid Race Raptor

1994816.effect:
(This card's original Level is always treated as 12.)
Cannot be Synchro Summoned. Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by sending 1 Machine or Psychic Tuner and any number of non-Tuner Dinosaur monsters (min. 1) you control to the GY, whose total Levels equal 12 or less. When Summoned this way: This card's Level becomes the total Levels of the sent monsters, then if this card's current Level is 10 or higher, you can destroy 1 face-up card on the field. Once per Chain (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card, and if you do, Special Summon any number of monsters from your GY, including a Dinosaur monster and a Tuner, whose total Levels equal this card's Level while on field.
1994816.name: Mechanized Dino Doomsday Device

1994814.effect:
1 Fiend Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner DARK Warrior monster(s)
If this card would be Synchro Summoned to your field, you can Synchro Summon it to your opponent's field instead. When this card is Special Summoned: Destroy all other monsters you control.
1994814.name: Rogue Warrior from Another Planet

1995498.effect:
1 Thunder Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner WATER monster(s)
(Quick Effect): You can target up to 2 Spell/Trap on the field; shuffle them into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Storm Serpent" once per turn.
1995498.name: Storm Serpent

1994828.effect:
1 WATER monster + 1+ non-Tuner Aqua, Fish or Sea Serpent Monster(s)
While the only cards you control are this card and exactly 1 "Umi" (and no other cards), this card is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. The ATK/DEF of all monsters your opponent controls become 0, also, change all monsters your opponent controls to face-up Attack Position, and they must attack, if able. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can gain LP equal to the original ATK or DEF of the destroyed monster (whichever is higher), and if you do, this card can Attack again in a row, also if you do not control "Umi", you cannot activate this effect of "The Kraken" again this turn
1994828.name: The Kraken

1995492.effect:
1 EARTH Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monster
(Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card, then target up to 2 face-up monsters on the field; change them to face-down Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Vorax, Plateau Dragon on the Precipice" once per turn.
1995492.name: Vorax, Plateau Dragon on the Precipice
1995492.treated_as: Vorax, Plateau Dragon on the Precipice

2007208.effect: If you control a "Tindangle" monster: You can discard 1 other card; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, then if it was Special Summoned from the hand, you can Special Summon 1 "Tindangle" monster from your Deck in face-up or face-down Defense Position. If this card is in your GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Set monster you control; flip it face-up. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Scythe Slasher" once per turn.
2007208.name: Tindangle Scythe Slasher

2007252.effect: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap card or effect, while you control a "Tindangle" Link Monster or a Defense Position "Tindangle" monster (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, then if it was Special Summoned from the hand, negate the activation. If this card is used for the Link Summon of a "Tindangle" monster: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 other "Tindangle" monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Astro Gardna" once per turn.
2007252.name: Tindangle Astro Gardna

2007226.effect: (This card is always treated as a "Tindangle" card.) If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Tindangle" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Point of Perfection". You can target 1 Set monster you control; flip it face-up. During the Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Tindangle" monster from your hand in face-up or face-down Defense Position, but send this card to the GY during the End Phase. You can only use one effect of "Point of Perfection" per turn, and only once per turn.
2007226.name: Point of Perfection

1601930.effect: (This is always treated as a "Tindangle" card.) When your opponent activates a monster effect: You can change the battle position of a face-down "Tindangle" monster you control, OR Set 1 face-up "Tindangle" monster you control, and if you do, negate the activation, then if your opponent controls more cards than you do, destroy it. If you Flip Summon a "Tindangle" monster, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Alcazar Shield" once per turn.
1601930.name: Alcazar Shield

1298190.effect:
1 "Tindangle" monster, except "Tindangle Acute Unicorn"
When this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Tindangle Base Gardna" from your Deck to your hand. When a "Tindangle" monster you control is flipped face-up, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Acute Unicorn" once per turn.
1298190.name: Tindangle Acute Unicorn

1298170.effect:
2 "Tindangle" monsters
You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Alcazar Shield" from your Deck to your hand. This card can be treated as 2 monsters for the Link Summon of a "Tindangle" monster. During your opponent's turn, if this card points to a face-down Defense Position monster (Quick Effect): You can change 1 monster this card points to to face-up Attack Position or face-up Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Acute Griffin" once per turn.
1298170.name: Tindangle Acute Griffin

2007274.effect:
3 "Tindangle", Fiend and/or Flip monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can pay 500 LP; Special Summon 1 Flip monster from your GY in face-up or face-down Defense Position to a zone this card points to. If a monster this card points to is flipped face-up: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, then Special Summon 1 "Tindangle Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). If another "Tindangle" monster battles an opponents monster, you can have your monster gain 500 ATK for every monster you control, until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Tindangle Obtuse Orthus" once per turn.
2007274.name: Tindangle Obtuse Orthus

2006768.effect: You can banish 2 "Wild Rose" Equip Spells from your GY; Special Summon this card from the GY. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can discard 1 "Wild Rose" card; excavate the top 4 cards of your Deck, and if you do, equip as many excavated "Wild Rose" Equip Spells to this card as possible, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Wild Rose Firion" once per turn.
2006768.name: Wild Rose Firion

2006776.effect: If you control a "Wild Rose" Spell (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish this card from the field or GY; excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, add 1 excavated "Wild Rose" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Wild Rose Minwu" once per turn.
2006776.name: Wild Rose Minwu

2006783.effect: You can discard this card; add 1 "Castle of Wild Rose - Fynn" from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from the GY; excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, send any excavated "Wild Rose" cards to the GY, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Wild Rose Princess Hilda" once per turn.
2006783.name: Wild Rose Princess Hilda

2006851.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Wild Rose" monster from your Deck to your hand. Other "Wild Rose" cards you control cannot be destroyed by card effects. At the start of the Battle Phase: You change the Battle Position of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls.
2006851.name: Castle of Wild Rose - Fynn

2006925.effect: If you control a "Wild Rose" monster; destroy 1 monster your opponent controls, then, if you control a "Wild Rose" Equip Spell, you can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only activate 1 "Wild Rose - Fynn Briar II" per turn.
2006925.name: Wild Rose - Fynn Briar II

2006829.effect: Equip only to a "Wild Rose" monster. It gains 500 ATK. At the start of the Damage Step, if it attacks an opponent's monster: Gain LP equal to half that monster's ATK. You can target 1 "Wild Rose" Spell in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Wild Rose - Blood Sword" once per turn.
2006829.name: Wild Rose - Blood Sword

2006805.effect:
Equip only to a "Wild Rose" monster. It gains 500 ATK. You can only use each of the following effects of "Wild Rose - Wizard's staff" once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Wild Rose - Wizard's Staff" per turn.
● You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; banish it
● Discard 1 "Wild Rose" card; add 1 "Wild Rose" Spell from your Deck to your hand, except "Wild Rose - Wizard's Staff".
2006805.name: Wild Rose - Wizard's Staff

2006915.effect: Equip only to a "Wild Rose" monster. It gains 500 ATK and cannot be banished by your opponent's card effects. You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; send it to the GY, and if you do, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. The Equipped monster cannot attack the turn you activate this effect. You can only use this effect of "Wild Rose - Artemis Bow" once per turn.
2006915.name: Wild Rose - Artemis Bow

2006815.effect: Equip only to a "Wild Rose" monster. It gains 500 ATK and can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. At the start of the Damage Step, if it attacks an opponent's monster: Negate that monster's effects until the end of the Damage Step. You can only use this effect of "Wild Rose - Orichalcum Dirk" once per turn.
2006815.name: Wild Rose - Orichalcum Dirk

2006792.effect: Equip only to a "Wild Rose" monster. It gains 500 ATK. At the start of the Damage Step, if it battles a monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can destroy that monster. You can target 1 "Wild Rose" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Wild Rose - Rune Axe" once per turn.
2006792.name: Wild Rose - Rune Axe

2004915.effect:
If you control an "Butterspy" monster, except "Riodinidae Butterspy": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is detached from an "Photon" or "Papilloperative" Xyz Monster and sent to the GY to activate that monster's effect: You can add 1 "Butterspy" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Riodinidae Butterspy". You can only use each effect of "Riodinidae Butterspy" once per turn. A "Photon" or "Papilloperative" Xyz Monster who has this card as Xyz Material gains this effect.
● Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; change it to defense position.
2004915.name: Riodinidae Butterspy

2004666.effect:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can reveal 1 "Butterspy" monster in your hand; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Butterspy" monster from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Viceroy Butterspy" once per turn. A "Photon" or "Papilloperative" Xyz Monster who has this card as Xyz Material gains this effect..
● Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; add 1 "Butterspy" monster from your Deck to your hand.
2004666.name: Viceroy Butterspy

2004861.effect: The first time each "Butterspy" or "Papilloperative monster you control would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. While all monsters you control are "Butterspy" monsters, monsters your opponent controls in Defenese Position have their effects negated. If this card is sent from the Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand. You can only activate this effect of "Butterspy Intergration" once per turn.
2004861.name: Butterspy Integration

2004609.effect: Target 1 "Butterspy" monster you control; Special Summon up to 2 "Butterspy" monsters from your hand or GY, with different names than that target. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Butterspy" monster you control; until your next Stanby Phase, it is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. You can only use each effect of "Butterspy Storm" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except "Photon Alexandra Queen", "Butterspy" and "Papilloperative" monsters.
2004609.name: Butterspy Storm

2004627.effect:
2 Level 4 "Butterspy" monsters
You take no Battle Damage from battles involving "Papilloperative" and "Butterspy" monsters. If this card is Xyz Summoned using "Blue Mountain Butterspy" as any of its materials: Your opponent cannot add cards from the Deck to their hand, during their next turn, except by drawing. You can detach 1 Material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Papilloperative" Xyz monster from your Extra Deck, except "Tyrant Papilloperative", then attach 1 "Butterspy" card from your hand or GY to it as material. You can only use this effect of "Tyrant Papilloperative" once per turn.
2004627.name: Tyrant Papilloperative

2004635.effect:
2 Level 4 "Butterspy" monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card: send 1 "Butterspy" or "Papilloperative" card from your hand to the GY; draw 2 cards. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster on the field; change it to Defense Position, and if you do, all monsters your opponent control lose 1200 ATK, until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Valk Papilloperative" once per turn.
2004635.name: Valk Papilloperative

2012904.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by sending 5 Warrior monsters you control to the GY. Up to thrice per turn (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 random monster your opponent controls. During the End Phase, if you destroyed 3 monsters by this effect: You can roll a six-sided die, then, if you rolled a 1 or 6, Set 1 Normal Trap from your Deck, also it can be activated this turn. You can only use this effect of "Hittameys, the Blind General" once per turn.
2012904.name: Hittameys, the Blind General

2010227.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Metalmorph" card from your Deck to your hand, then you can add 1 Level 3 or 7 DARK Normal Monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, or, if this is the only monster you control, you can Special Summon it, instead, and if you do, it cannot be destroyed or banished by card effects, but you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn.
2010227.name: Incher

2010232.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by Tributing "Incher" equipped with "Metalmorph". If this card is Special Summoned: You can Set 1 "Metalmorph" card from your GY.
2010232.name: Metalincher

2010204.effect: If a card is targeted by the effect of a "Leaf Man" card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY.
2010204.name: The Leaf Man

2010199.effect: Target 1 card on the field; resolve this effect.
2010199.name: Inspired by the Leaf Man

2003529.effect: During your Main Phase 2: Draw 1 card for each card your opponent has drawn during their previous turn. You can only activate 1 "Pot of Pleonexia" per turn.
2003529.name: Pot of Pleonexia

2010238.effect:
Target 1 face-up monster on the field; equip this card to that target. This card's name becomes "Metalmorph" while face-up on the field. During the Main Phase: You can activate the appropriate effect(s), depending on the equipped monster.
● Normal Monster: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
● Effect Monster: Set 1 "Metalmorph" Trap from your Deck, except "Fullmetalmorph", then you can equip this card to 1 Normal Monster on the field.
You can only use this effect of "Fullmetalmorph" once per turn per equipped monster's original name.
2010238.name: Fullmetalmorph

2014919.effect: Each time a Fusion Monster is Fusion Summoned by banishing a Fusion Material(s) in your possession: You can target 1 card on the field; send it to the GY, then banish that card in the GY during the End Phase. You can only control 1 "Tyrmadical Hierarchy".
2014919.name: Tyrmadical Hierarchy

2014904.effect:
2 Effect Monsters with different Attributes
During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it, up to 1 each from your hand, field, and GY. If this card leaves the field: You can Set 1 banished "Polymerization" to your field. You can only use 1 "Alyster Thylyma" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
2014904.name: Alyster Thylyma

2014870.effect:
2+ Effect Monsters
You cannot Summon/Set monsters to any Extra Monster Zone this card points to. Can only declare attacks on linked monsters. If a monster is destroyed by battle: You can make each player gain 2000 LP, then apply 1 of these effects (but you cannot apply that same effect of "Hyper Ryder" again this turn).
● Special Summon the destroyed monster to any zone this card points to.
● Move 1 monster your opponent controls to another Main Monster Zone on either field.
● Banish this card until the End Phase.
2014870.name: Hyper Ryder

639181.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Legendary Knight" card from your Deck to your hand. If you would Fusion Summon a Dragon monster using "The Eye of Timaeus", you can treat this card as any "Dark Magician" card when used as the Fusion Material. If a Fusion monster you control would be destroyed by a card effect: Banish this card from your GY instead.
639181.name: Legendary Knight's Servant

639180.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Legend of Heart" card from your Deck to your hand. If a Fusion monster you control is targeted by a card effect (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; Negate that effect.
639180.name: Legendary Knight's Squire

639178.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Legendary Dragon" card from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card and 1 "Legendary Dragon" card from your GY then target 1 Fusion monster in your GY; Special Summon that monster, ignoring its summoning conditions.
639178.name: Legendary Knight's Familiar

803023.effect: Once per turn: You can pay 1000 LP; Add 1 "Legendary Knight" monster from your Deck to your hand. If you Special Summon a Fusion monster: You can target 1 "Legendary Knight" monster in your GY: Special Summon that monster.
803023.name: Seal of the Legendary Dragons

639185.effect: Once per turn: You can pay 1000 LP; You can Normal Summon 1 "Legendary Knight" monster in addition to your Normal Summon this turn. If a "Legendary Knight" monster you control is sent from your field to your GY: Add 1 "Legendary Knight" or "Legendary Dragon" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Emblem of the Legendary Dragons" once per turn.
639185.name: Emblem of the Legendary Dragons

1706719.effect: Once per turn, if you control a "Legendary Knight" monster: You can activate this effect; this turn, all monsters your opponent controls must attack if able, also you choose the attack targets for your opponent's attacks.
1706719.name: Legend of Heart - Knights' Resolve

1706725.effect: If you control a Dragon Fusion monster: You can target cards your opponent controls up to the number of "Legendary Dragon" cards in your GY; Negate those cards' effects, then destroy them.
1706725.name: Legend of Heart - Dragons' Fury

7369.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Legend of Heart". When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; banish that target. Once per turn, when this card is targeted for an attack: You can target 1 Effect Monster in your GY; until the End Phase of your next turn, this card's name becomes that target's original name, and replace this effect with that target's original effects.
7369.name: Legendary Knight Hermos

7363.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Legend of Heart". When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; banish that target. When this card is targeted for an attack: You can target 1 Trap in your GY; Set that target. It can be activated this turn.
7363.name: Legendary Knight Critias

6609.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Legend of Heart". When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; banish that target. When this card is targeted for an attack: You can target 1 Spell in your GY; Set that target.
6609.name: Legendary Knight Timaeus

7367.effect:
(This card is also always treated as "Legendary Dragon Critias".)
Send 1 Trap from your hand or field to the GY, that is listed on a Fusion Monster that can only be Special Summoned with "The Fang of Critias" (if that card is Set, reveal it), then Special Summon that Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck. You can only activate 1 "The Fang of Critias" per turn.
7367.name: The Fang of Critias

7374.effect:
(This card is also always treated as "Legendary Dragon Hermos".)
Send 1 monster from your hand or field to the GY, of the Type that is listed on a Fusion Monster that can only be Special Summoned with "The Claw of Hermos" (if that card is Set, reveal it), then Special Summon that Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck. You can only activate 1 "The Claw of Hermos" per turn.
7374.name: The Claw of Hermos

6478.effect:
(This card is also always treated as "Legendary Dragon Timaeus".)
Target 1 "Dark Magician" monster you control; Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that lists that monster on the field as Fusion Material, using it as the Fusion Material. You can only activate 1 "The Eye of Timaeus" per turn.
6478.name: The Eye of Timaeus

6610.effect: Pay 2000 LP and Tribute 1 Warrior monster; banish up to 3 "Legendary Dragon" Spells with different names from your hand and/or GY, and if you do, Special Summon that many "Legendary Knight" monsters with different names from your hand, Deck, and/or GY. You can only activate 1 "Legend of Heart" per turn.
6610.name: Legend of Heart

7362.effect:
"Legendary Knight Timaeus" + "Legendary Knight Critias" + "Legendary Knight Hermos"
Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by sending the above cards you control to the GY. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Unaffected by other cards' effects. Once per battle, if this card battles, during damage calculation (Quick Effect): You can make this card's ATK/DEF become equal to the ATK of the monster on the field with the highest ATK (your choice, if tied). When this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 3 "Legendary Knight" monsters from your hand, Deck, and/or GY, ignoring their Summoning conditions.
7362.name: Timaeus the Knight of Destiny

9258.effect: Must be Special Summoned with "The Fang of Critias", using "Ring of Destruction". Once per turn: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. Then, if it was a Monster Card, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK.
9258.name: Destruction Dragon

7366.effect: Must be Special Summoned with "The Fang of Critias", using "Mirror Force". When a monster(s) you control is targeted for an attack or by an opponent's card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can destroy all cards your opponent controls.
7366.name: Mirror Force Dragon

7365.effect: Must be Special Summoned with "The Fang of Critias", using "Tyrant Wing". This card can attack all your opponent's monsters, once each. You can target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this monster to that target. It gains 400 ATK/DEF, also it can make 3 attacks during each Battle Phase.

7364.effect: Must be Special Summoned with "The Fang of Critias", using "Crush Card Virus". If this card is Special Summoned: Look at your opponent's hand, all monsters they control, and all cards they draw until the end of their 3rd turn after this effect's activation, and destroy all those monsters with 1500 or more ATK.

7370.effect: Must be Special Summoned with "The Claw of Hermos", using a Spellcaster monster. If this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 other face-up monster on the field; equip this card to it. At the start of the Damage Step, if it battles an opponent's monster: You can roll a six-sided die, and banish that opponent's monster until the Standby Phase of the Nth turn after this effect's activation (N = the result).
7370.name: Time Magic Hammer

7373.effect: Must be Special Summoned with "The Claw of Hermos", using a Dragon monster. If this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 other face-up monster on the field; equip this card to it. It gains 1000 ATK, and 500 ATK/DEF for each Dragon monster on the field and in the GYs.
7373.name: Red-Eyes Black Dragon Sword

7372.effect: Must be Special Summoned with "The Claw of Hermos", using a Warrior monster. If this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 other face-up monster on the field; equip this card to it. While this card is equipped to a monster by this effect, negate the first effect activated by your opponent during each Battle Phase, also, after that, the equipped monster can make a second attack during this Battle Phase.
7372.name: Goddess Bow

7371.effect: Must be Special Summoned with "The Claw of Hermos", using a Warrior monster. If this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 other face-up monster on the field; equip this card to it. It can make a second attack during each Battle Phase, also, if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
7371.name: Rocket Hermos Cannon

6583.effect:
"Dark Magician" + 1 Dragon monster
Must be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials or with "The Eye of Timaeus". If this card is Special Summoned: Target any number of Spells in any GY(s) (min. 1); banish those targets, and if you do, this card gains 100 ATK for each card banished by this effect. If this card is destroyed: You can target 1 Spellcaster monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

8936.effect:
"Dark Magician" + 1 Dragon monster
This card's name becomes "Dark Magician" while on the field or in the GY. Your opponent cannot target Spells/Traps you control with card effects, also they cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

6477.effect:
"Dark Magician Girl" + 1 Dragon monster
Must be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials or with "The Eye of Timaeus". Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY, then target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy that target.

1555464.effect:
When this card is Summoned: Activate 1 of the following effects. You can only use this effect of "Ascension Sky Herald" once per turn.
● Tribute this card, then target 1 card in either GY; banish it.
● Pay 600 LP; send 1 "Ascension Sky" card from your Deck to your GY.
If this card is sent to the GY; you can add it from your GY to your hand, but for the rest of this turn, this card cannot activate its effects, except this effect. You can only use this effect of "Ascension Sky Herald" once per turn.

1555475.effect:
When this card is Summoned: Activate 1 of the following effects.You can only use this effect of "Ascension Sky Knight" once per turn.

● Pay 800 LP; Special Summon 1 "Ascension Sky" monster from your Deck.
If this card is sent to the GY; you can add it from your GY to your hand, but for the rest of this turn, this card cannot activate its effects, except this effect. You can only use this effect of "Ascension Sky Knight" once per turn.

1589128.effect: You can banish other 1 LIGHT monster from your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. If Summoned this way, shuffle 1 of your banished LIGHT monsters into the Deck. If this card is sent to the GY; you can add it from your GY to your hand, but for the rest of this turn, this card cannot activate its effects, except this effect. You can only use this effect of "Ascension Sky Lancer" once per turn.

1589144.effect: You can banish other 1 LIGHT monster from your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can Tribute 1 monster, then target 2 monsters your oppoennt controls; destroy them. 1567246.effect: Equip only to a "Ascension Sky" Synchro Monster. It gains 1000 ATK. If this card leaves the field, because the monster it was equipped leaves the field, you can target that monster; return it to the Extra Deck, then add this card to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Ascension Sky Sword: Kingslayer" per turn.

1564518.effect: Pay 1400 LP and discard 2 "Ascension Sky" cards, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If you control an "Ascension Sky" Synchro Monster when this card is activated, banish it instead. You can only activate 1 "Ascension Sky Thunder" per turn.

1563940.effect: All "Ascension Sky" monsters gain 500 ATK/DEF. If this card is sent to the GY, you can add it from your GY to your hand. 1156375.effect: Flames scorching the earth, birthing flames scorching the heavens. Little can stand in the way of this literal force of nature.
1156375.name: Locus of Ascending Fire
1156375.pendulum_effect: Once per turn: You can add 1 "Ascending Fire" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Locus of Ascending Fire", then destroy this card.

1148838.effect:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with the following effect.
● If you Summoned a Normal Monster(s) this turn, when a monster with that monster's name attacks or is attacked, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the damage step.
1148838.name: Aspect of Ascending Fire - Blinding Light
1148838.pendulum_effect: If a Gemini Normal Monster you control attacks or is attacked, it is treated as an Effect Monster and gains its effect(s). If a monster battles, after damage calculation, OR at the start of the Battle Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Ascending Fire" card from your Pendulum Zone in Attack Position. You choose the attack targets for your opponent's attacks.
1148838.treated_as: Aspect of Ascending Fire - Blinding Light

This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with the following effect.

1148836.effect:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with the following effect.
● If you Summoned a Normal Monster(s) this turn, destroy any monster that battles with a monster you control with that monster's name after damage calculation, then negate its effects in the GY.

1148843.effect: Add 1 "Ascending Fire" card from your GY to your hand, except "Embers of Ascending Fire", then you can place 1 "Ascending Fire" Pendulum Monster from your hand in your Pendulum Zone, OR take 1 "Ascending Fire" Field Spellf from your hand, and activate it. At the start of the Battle Phase: You can destroy 1 card you control, then add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Embers of Ascending Fire" once per turn.
1148843.name: Embers of Ascending Fire

1148834.effect: Unaffected by card effects during the Battle Phase while you control less monsters than your opponent. If a "Ascending Fire" card(s) would be destroyed, you can send 1 card from your face-up Extra Deck to the GY, instead. If a monster declares an attack: You can place 1 "Ascending Fire" Pendulum Monster from your face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. Once per Battle Phase, during the end of the Battle Phase: Both players tribute as many of their monsters that were Summoned during this Battle Phase as possible.

1156660.effect: Destroy 1 other "Ascending Fire" card you control, then draw 2 cards. If a "Ascending Fire" card(s) you control would be sent to the GY, banished, or returned to the hand or Deck by a card effect, you can banish this card from your GY, instead. You can only use each effect of "Ignition of Ascending Fire" once per turn.

At the start of the Battle Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; conduct this Battle Phase twice, but halve all damage taken by either player during this turn. You can only use each effect of "Passage of Ascending Fire" once per turn.

1162813.effect: Place 1 "Ascending Fire" Pendulum Monster from your Deck or GY in your Pendulum Zone, also for the rest of this turn, your opponent's monsters cannot be destroyed by battle, also if it is your opponent's turn, change them to face-up Attack Position, and they must attack this turn, if able. The activation and effect of this card cannot be negated during your opponent's turn. You can only activate 1 "Arc of Ascending Fire" per turn.

2010035.effect: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target. If this card is sent from your Main Monster Zone to your GY: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target. You can only use each effect of "Spellmaker Destruction" once per turn.

2010087.effect:
If you control a "Spellmaker" monster and a Spell/Trap in your Main Monster Zone: You can banish 1 "Spellmaker" card from your GY; apply 1 of the following effects, depending on the type. You cannot apply that same effect of "Spellmaker Alliance" for the rest of this turn.
● Monster: Double the ATK of all "Spellmaker" monsters you currently control, until the end of this turn.
● Spell: Your opponent cannot target "Spellmaker" cards you control with card effects this turn.
● Trap: Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of your "Spellmaker" cards or effects for the rest of this turn.

2010897.effect:
2+ "Spellmaker" monsters
For this card's Link Summon, you can also use Spell/Trap in your Main Monster Zone as Link Material. You can only Special Summon "Adra, Spellmaker of the Curse(s)" once per turn. Once per turn, when an opponent's Spell/Trap Card is activated while you control a Spell/Trap in your Main Monster Zone: Destroy 1 of your Spell/Trap in your Main Monster Zone, and if you do, negate the activation, and if you do that, Special Summon it to your field as a Normal Monster (Fiend/DARK/Level 4/ATK 0/DEF 0).

2010142.effect:
2+ "Spellmaker" monsters

1787343.effect:
You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Wyrm monsters. If this card is Special Summoned by its own effect: You can add 1 "Crypt" Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Crypt Force Jade Master" once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following "Crypt Force Jade Master" effects per turn, and only once that turn.
● If this card is in your hand: You can banish 1 "Crypt" card from your GY; Special Summon this card.
● If this card is in your GY: You can banish 1 "Crypt" card from your hand.
1787343.name: Crypt Force Jade Master

1999344.effect:
You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Wyrm monsters. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Wyrm monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Crypt Force Mint Daybreak" once per turn. You can only use 1 of the following "Crypt Force Mint Daybreak" effects per turn, and only once that turn.
● You can return this card to your hand, and if you do, place 1 of your banished cards on the top of your Deck.
● You can banish this card from your GY; inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each "Crypt" monster you control.

1787338.effect:

● If this card is in your GY: You can banish 1 "Crypt" card from your hand.
1787338.name: Crypt Force Quiet Breath

1787332.effect:
You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Wyrm monsters. If this card is Special Summon by its own effect: You can add 1 of your banished "Crypt" cards to your hand. 1787334.effect:

1787334.name: Crypt Force Smiling Avalanche

1787350.effect: This card can be Ritual Summoned with any "Crypt" Ritual Spell. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can add 1 of your banished "Crypt" cards to your hand. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand. If this card is banished: You can add 1 "Crypt" Spell Card or 1 "Crypt" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Crypt Emperor Destiny Grimace" once per turn.
1787350.name: Crypt Emperor Destiny Grimace

1787360.effect: This card can be Ritual Summoned with any "Crypt" Ritual Spell. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can return 1 of your banished "Crypt" cards to the GY. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. If this card is banished: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; negate its effects, until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Crypt General Destiny Scarr" once per turn.
1787360.name: Crypt General Destiny Scarr

1787366.effect: This card can be Ritual Summoned with any "Crypt" Ritual Spell. "Crypt" Ritual monsters you control cannot be targeted by your opponents card effect, except this card. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can target 1 "Crypt" monster you control; it gains 1500 ATK, until the End Phase. If this card is banished: You can reveal 1 "Crypt" card in your hand; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, add 1 "Crypt" Ritual Monster that is banished or in your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Crypt General Destiny Thunder" once per turn.
1787366.name: Crypt General Destiny Thunder

1787374.effect: This card can be Ritual Summoned with any "Crypt" Ritual Spell. Any monster destroyed by battle with a "Crypt" monster is banished, instead of going to the GY. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can target 1 of your banished "Crypt" card; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this card is banished: You can target 1 "Crypt" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Crypt General Destiny Warden" once per turn.
1787374.name: Crypt General Destiny Warden

1787391.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Crypt" Ritual Monster that is banished or in your hand. You must also Tribute monsters from your field and/or shuffle banished "Crypt" monsters into the Deck, whose total combined Levels equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. If this card is banished: You can send 1 monster you control to the GY; add this card to your hand. You can only activate this effect of "Crypt Rising Tide" once per turn.
1787391.name: Crypt Rising Tide

2003121.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Crypt" Ritual Monster that is in your hand or GY. You must also banish Wyrm monster from your GY, whose combined Levels equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. If this card is banished: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; change it to face-down defense postion. Monsters changed to face-down Defense Position by this effect cannot change their battle positions. You can only use this effect of "Crypt Touchdown" once per turn.
2003121.name: Crypt Touchdown

2011730.effect:
2 "Crypt" monsters, including a Ritual Monster
Must be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by Tributing the above cards you control (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). If this card is Special Summoned: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Banish the top card of your Deck.
● Place 1 of your banished "Crypt" cards on the top of your Deck.
During the Damage Step, if a "Crypt" attacks an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can target that opponent's monster; its ATK becomes 0 until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Crypt Challange Heavens Calpe" once per turn.
2011730.name: Crypt Challenger Heavens Calpe

2012593.effect: If you Normal or Special Summon a "T.G." monster(s), except during the Damage Step: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, draw 1 card, then you can Special Summon it if it is a "T.G." monster. If this card is sent to the GY by a card or effect: Add 1 "T.G." monster or "TG" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "N.T.G. Knight Drake" once per turn.
2012593.name: N.T.G. Knight Drake
2012593.pendulum_effect: Once per turn: If you Synchro Summon a monster: Banish 1 card from your opponent's GY.

2012490.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "T.G." monster or "TG" Spell/Trap to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can banish this card from your GY: Return up to 3 banished "T.G." monsters to your GY except "N.T.G. Mekmaiden". You can only use each effect of "N.T.G. Mekmaiden" once per turn.
2012490.name: N.T.G. Mekmaiden
2012490.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "T.G." monsters. This effect cannot be negated. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "T.G." monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

2012330.effect:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can send 1 "T.G." monster from your Deck to your GY. You can discard 1 "T.G." card or 1 "TG" Spell/Trap, then target 1 monster your opponent controls: Its ATK becomes 0. You can only use each effect of "T.G. Wyrmblader" once per turn.
2012330.name: T.G. Wyrmblader

2012218.effect:
1 Tuner Synchro Monster + 1 non-Tuner Synchro Monster
When a "T.G." monster you control destroys an opponent's monster by battle, after damage calculation: Banish that opponent's monster. If a monster your opponent controls target's a "T.G." monster for attack (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 "T.G." monster that is banished or in your GY into your Deck; change the attack target to this card. If this card is destroyed by a card or effect; Special Summon 1 "T.G." Synchro Tuner from your GY. You can only use each effect of "T.G. Wulf King" once per turn.
2012218.name: T.G. Wulf King

2012133.effect:
1 Tuner Synchro Monster + 1 non-Tuner Synchro Monster
"T.G." Synchro Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "T.G." monster from your hand or GY; destroy 1 card on the field. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can banish this card you control; Special Summon 1 Tuner Synchro Monster that is banished or from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon this banished card during your Standby Phase. You can only use this effect of "T.G. Vermilion Astray" once per turn.
2012133.name: T.G. Vermilion Astray

2012636.effect:
1 Tuner Synchro Monster + 2 or more non-Tuner Synchro Monsters
Must first be Synchro Summoned. If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target cards your opponent controls and/or in their Graveyard, up to the number of Synchro Monsters in your GY; banish them. This card's maximum number of attacks per Battle Phase equals the number of "T.G." Synchro monsters you control and in your GY.
2012636.name: T.G. Dawnbringer
